section.title: image
section.para: Specifies which image mimetypes are supported by the client. Each parameter must be a single mimetype, listed in order of client preference, with the optimal mimetype being the first parameter.

It is expected that the supported mimetypes will include at least "image/png" and "image/jpeg", and the server may safely assume that these mimetypes are supported, even if they are absent from the handshake.
